title: ↕Elevator Pitches
desc: What's a 20-30 second elevator pitch that answers the question, "Why Bitcoin?"

msgs.text: What's a 20-30 second elevator pitch that answers the question, "Why Bitcoin?"
It’s truly decentralized, you can be your own bank, you can verify your own transactions, and the best part is you actually own it and no one can seize it.

Bitcoin is a new savings technology that allows you to safely store your own wealth without any liability from other parties like banks or governments. Your dollars are losing value every day and there's nothing you can do about it because you don't control the money printer...they do. Convert your weak dollars to hard money...namely, Bitcoin.
I wouldn't say the word "decentralization" in an elevator pitch. Most people don't even know what that means
I think a lot of people have an idea
Especially if someone is asking “why bitcoin?”
anyone who invests in "defi" has no clue what decentralization means. And that's everyone who is "crypto" over bitcoin. tens of millions of people
since defi is DINO
when you tell someone "that's decentralized in name only" they're gonna nod but they're not going to understand
Unless you take 2 minutes to explain
Well I would argue they know what it means but they’re also being fooled into thinking their coins are decentralized
Also decentralized can have a few meanings
good point
and yea, I've learned 3 separate ways to interpret decentralization. I write about them here
The most simple one meaning De- central so anything opposite of central
Can have so many elevator pitches
Yeah you could have different pitches for different people
I actually started to write a book on orange pilling methods
hehe

Why bitcoin? Because Bitcoin eliminates the need for central banks and authority. It’s based off of a proof of work system in which the people band together to secure / verify transactions. You can be your own bank and control your own security. It’s also the worlds most scarce asset with a cap on the supply.
Then you walk out the elevator and turn back and say fuck shitcoin!
let me think of some different ones
with different spins

Bitcoin is a portal that will lead you to truth and prosperity. Staying where you are, running in place inside the fiat hamster wheel will rob you of your hard earned wealth and precious time. Bitcoin is a way to opt-out of that dystopian nightmare and gain financial independence that will lead you to bettering yourself and the world around you.
